original_text: The people of countries that are near to you will laugh at you. Those who live far away will also laugh at you. You will no longer receive any honour because your city is full of trouble.
korean_text: 너 이름이 더럽고 어지러움이 많은 자여 가까운 자나 먼 자나 다 너를 조롱하리라

sentences.original_text: The people of countries that are near to you
You will no longer receive any honour
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 더 이상 어떤 존경도 받지 못할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: because your city is full of trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 당신의 도시는 문제로 가득하기 때문입니다.
